RTCPeerConnectionIceConnectionState.summary:
The read-only property RTCPeerConnection.iceConnectionState returns
a string which state of the {{Glossary("ICE")}} agent associated with the :
new, checking, connected, completed,
failed, disconnected, and closed.

remarks.para:
You can detect when this value has changed by watching for the
event.

RTCPeerConnectionIceConnectionState.value: The current state of the ICE agent and its connection. The value is one of the following strings:
